"'Control'" is the debut single by American hip hop artist Kid Sister from her
album [[Ultraviolet (Kid Sister album)|Ultraviolet]]. The song was released via
Fool's Gold Records in 2007 (see 2007 in music) and is included in the Android
operating system for mobile devices.
